Food Menu

Chicken Biriyani

Chicken Biryani is a South Asian delight featuring marinated chicken and fragrant basmati rice, slow-cooked with a blend of spices. Garnished with fried onions and herbs, it's a flavorful and beloved dish for any occasion.

Price: ₹ 250

Beef Biriyani

Beef Biryani is a South Asian delight that combines tender beef, aromatic basmati rice, and a blend of spices. Marinated and slow-cooked, this dish offers a rich and flavorful experience, garnished with fried onions and herbs for added depth. It's a hearty and satisfying choice for those who appreciate the savory essence of beef in biryani

Price: ₹ 250

Mutton Biriyani

Mutton Biryani is a South Asian delight that brings together tender mutton, aromatic basmati rice, and a blend of spices. Marinated and slow-cooked, it offers a rich and flavorful experience, garnished with fried onions and herbs for added delight.

Price: ₹ 250

Fish biriyani

Fish Biryani is a South Asian specialty that blends tender fish, fragrant basmati rice, and spices. Marinated and slow-cooked, it offers a delicious and aromatic twist to traditional biryani, served with herbs and raita for a delightful meal.

Price: ₹ 250
